text: Razvratnyye zhenshchiny [prednaznacheny] razvratnym muzhchinam, razvratnyye muzhchiny - razvratnym zhenshchinam, dobroporyadochnyye zhenshchiny - dobroporyadochnym muzhchinam, dobroporyadochnyye muzhchiny - dobroporyadochnym zhenshchinam. Oni neprichastny k tomu, chto vozvodyat na nikh [klevetniki]. Im ugotovany proshcheniye i shchedryy nadel
